main module

async main.create_task(sprint_id: int, task: TaskCreate, current_employee=Depends(get_current_user), db=Depends(get_db))[source]
async main.create_user(user: EmployeeCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))[source]

Create a new user with the given email, if the email exists w/in the database , then raise a 404 HTTP error If the given email is not in a correct type, a 422 error code is raised

@PARA: user: represents the info inputted by the user when creating a new account on

frontend

db: a database session
